name: Kaijucitos
description:
Kaijucitos is a Platformer/Fighting game where two monsters have a fight to see who is the best, eat humans to recover your power and show why you are THE BEST.

Need 2 Xbox Controllers to play

Just Unzip and Play

Game made by:

Pablo Noceda Cano

Keter Moyrón Rivera

Twitters:

@PableteNC

@KeterMoyron

Enjoy :D
